Sentencas: A short stack of the Jillich F10 design with anode-supported cells (ASCs; in fuel cell mode), based on the Jfifich design with a lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite (LSCF) air electrode, was employed for a medium-term co electrolysis operation in technically-relevant conditions at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: The feed and product gases for an identically constructed stack under the same conditions were monitored by a process-grade gas analysis system analyzing all relevant gases, including water per direct measurement.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: The product gas composition conforms to the expectation based on electrolysis and the reverse water-gas shift (RWGS) reaction for a wide range of conversion ratios.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: The formation of methane as a by-product is discussed.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: The degradation for stationary phases of the experiment amounted to similar to 2% kh(-1) (voltage degradation) and 4% kh(-1) (based on area specific resistance (ASR)), respectively.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: Based on the evaluation of electrochemical impedance spectra and post-mortem analyses, the degradation is induced by the depletion of nickel near the electrolyte interface which must be urgently resolved.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: A hypothesis for an electrochemical mechanism is postulated that complements existing theories.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack

Sentencas: The mass transport contributes the most to the total impedance and the porosity in our cathodes should be optimized for electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Syngas production performance and degradation analysis of a solid oxide electrolyzer stack
